task.title: Viewing Archived Items
task.shortdesc: Monday allows you to archive items instead of deleating them. You may wish to access a past task to view information about it. You can set automations to archive items to save time.

prereq.p: You must login to view archived items.

taskbody.context: Archiving items is good practice and allows users to keep their boards clean and orderly. Follow the instructions below to view archived items.

step.cmd: Click the three dots in the top right corner of the page.
Click Archived items/ Groups in the drop down menu

info.p: You can now view your archived groups or add them back to your board.
